body: @jonathan-hurley For the changes in AlertStateChangedEventTest, it kept failing in my local test environment and only after I did these changes, the test cases could be passed. But Iater I also noticed that a few test cases can pass in Jenkins and failed locally, I guess it may be caused by memory limitation. Let me revert this file and update the patch and see if it can be passed in Jenkins build.

@jonathan-hurley  Verified that AlertStateChangedEventTest without changes passed all UT cases in Jenkins build, I have reverted this file. Please review again. Thanks.
@jonathan-hurley Thanks. Could you help me merge this patch to feature branch?
The fail is not related to the change.

LGTM. One remark though: I think you only need to add a SingleTopologyUpdater if you want to replace _localhost_ in the property. _%HOSTGROUP_N%_ tokens are replaced for all properties now.

@swagle 
Do you mean that we should get rid of the fixConfigGroupsForDeletedServices() method and rewrite the warning message in the checkConfigGroupsForDeletedServices to suggest manual deletion for orphan config group records instead of auto-fix?
